order.5: All non-essential business closed, essential medical procedures only
order.4: Elective medical procedures and surgeries allowed, non-essential business closed, social distancing in effect
order.3: Elective medical procedures allowed, curb-side delivery can reopen, and a select few non-essential businesses reopen
order.2: Some non-essential businesses open, with restrictions on capacity, social distancing still in effect
order.1: All non-essential businesses reopen, social distancing in effect
order.0: Resume life as before, all businesses open and social distancing lifted
